Travels Europe 2012 Tivoli Gardens, Copenhagen

Tivoli Gardens, Copenhagen

Tivoli Gardens are in the heart of Copenhagen - right next to the Central Station. It is a amusement park that has bee around hundreds of years and includes a music stage and some vibrant gardens. We had a handful of hours in Copenhagen before jumping on a train into Sweden so we decided to laze around in the park.

  • I was unsuccessful in getting Sally to go on this ride
  • It is important to feed the fish.
